name: Dogworld
description:
Dogworld is a 2D action platformer where you join forces with dogs capable of speech, battle against robots and wild creatures, collect new weapons and abilities, and face off against deadly bosses.
Launched from the safety of his Pod to the ruined world above, Boy is free from the A.I. Daddy's maniacal clutches. But when Daddy threatens the lives of the talking dogs who take Boy in, Boy has no choice but to end Daddy's rule once and for all. Traverse unique biomes as you make your way through the ruined world, uncovering clues about it's downfall as you gain new weapons and abilities, until you finally face off against Daddy himself over the fate of all man-kind.
Explore a world where all the living creatures seem to be some variety of dog
Slide to dodge through enemies and projectiles
Uncover secrets and abilities to help you on your journey
Traverse difficult platforming and combat challenges
Take on a multitude of powerful bosses
Pet dogs
